text: Acire'i amara nirdesabali theke ami phiriye debo tadera yara desera madhye an'yayabhabe ahankara kare. Ara yadi'o tara pratyekati nidarsana dekhate paya tabu tara ote bisbasa karabe na, ara yadi tara bhranta pathera dekha paya tabe take tara patha bale grahana kare. Eti ejan'ya ye tara amadera nirdesa-samuhake pratyakhyana karechila, ara tate tara udasina hayechila.
